name: Wolf Spirit - NES Game
description:
Controls:
✜ Move
Ⓐ Jump
Ⓐ+✜ Wallgrab if near wall
Ⓑ Tomahawk

Plot
An evil spirit has put a curse on the world and you as a legendary wolf must find the cure and stop him.
You must go through various trials to restablish balance, in the first trial you play as a native wolf
and must stop the evil spirit in a native american setting.
Go and destroy herds of minions on this action platformer!

Team
Art and design: ZolioOnline
Music: Tuï
Code: Valdir Salgueiro

Special thanks to wallmaster for testing and feedbacks
